dc.title: RUC - NOAA/ESRL/GSD
dc.description: The Rapid Update Cycle (RUC) is a high-frequency weather forecast (numerical weather prediction) and data assimilation system. This page has real-time products from different versions of the RUC and a wealth of information on it.
